original_title: Rolling in the Sky: Frecce Tricolori
overview: Established in 1961, the Italian Air Force's Frecce Tricolori stunt-flying team is the only air squadron in the world that flies nine planes in formation and one plane on its own -- a set-up that affords flyers more flexibility and makes for tighter formations. This compilation of stunning aerial footage captures the team's acrobatic dynamism on three cameras placed strategically throughout each cockpit.
title: Rolling in the Sky: Frecce Tricolori
